content.raw:
@{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} the 5 days old image is working \(I mean at least starting\), so I do not want to drop it because the newer images so far fail for me \(but could be only my problem with remote machine\).

@{557058:6ff86fcb-b7ab-44a5-b8a6-f6d9cae8b6e8} it is pity - we used compressed topic to reduce the logged stream, but up to now I am still not sure if we could use/access any files besides score log file after the simulation is completed?? If not then it does not matter but it will be hard to debug potential differences.
content.html:
@Alfredo Bencomo the 5 days old image is working (I mean at least starting), so I do not want to drop it because the newer images so far fail for me (but could be only my problem with remote machine).

@Louise Poubel it is pity - we used compressed topic to reduce the logged stream, but up to now I am still not sure if we could use/access any files besides score log file after the simulation is completed?? If not then it does not matter but it will be hard to debug potential differences.
